title: Privies shall be at the rear of the main building and not less than 10 feet from it
clause_text: Privies shall be at the rear of the main building and not less than 10 feet from it. They shall be innocuous to the neighbors. They shall not be within 30 feet of a well and shall be screened from public view.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
